mapper.sql: role_id, role, role_name, create_user, created, update_user, updated, locked
mapper.select: SELECT rur.role_id ,mr.role ,mr.role_name , mr.create_user , mr.created , mr.update_user , mr.updated , mr.locked FROM r_user_role rur LEFT JOIN m_role mr ON rur.role_id=mr.role_id WHERE rur.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into m_role (role_id, role, role_name, create_user, created, update_user, updated, locked) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{locked,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into m_role
role_id,
role,
role_name,
create_user,
created,
update_user,
updated,
locked,

mapper.update:
update m_role
role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
locked = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT},
where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update m_role set role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT} where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
